name: cl
description: Build Full Stack Web Application using JS, Bootstrap, Fontawesome, NodeJS, And Mongodb using BS5 JS Builder
author: printf83@gmail.com

scripts.build-development: webpack --config webpack/development/delete.js && webpack --config webpack/development/copy.js && webpack --config webpack/development/other.js
scripts.build: webpack --config webpack/production/delete.js && webpack --config webpack/production/copy.js && webpack --config webpack/production/other.js
